description: Retrieves how many active member accounts have each feature enabled within GuardDuty. Only a delegated GuardDuty administrator of an organization can run this API. When you create a new organization, it might take up to 24 hours to generate the statistics for the entire organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the statistics report for your organization.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the organization statistics was last updated. This is in UTC format.

nested_items.name: OrganizationStatistics
nested_items.description: Information about the GuardDuty coverage statistics for members in your Amazon Web Services organization.

nested_items.name: TotalAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of accounts in your Amazon Web Services organization.

nested_items.name: MemberAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of accounts in your Amazon Web Services organization that are associated with GuardDuty.

nested_items.name: ActiveAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of active accounts in your Amazon Web Services organization that are associated with GuardDuty.

nested_items.name: EnabledAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of accounts that have enabled GuardDuty.

nested_items.name: CountByFeature
nested_items.description: Retrieves the coverage statistics for each feature.

nested_items.name: EnabledAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of accounts that have enabled a specific feature.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the additional configuration within a feature.

nested_items.name: EnabledAccountsCount
nested_items.description: Total number of accounts that have enabled the additional configuration.
